title: Activist Investor Meister to Join Illumina’s Board
excerpt: Keith Meister’s hedge fund Corvex Management has a 2.5% stake in the gene-sequencing machine maker.
text: BusinessKeith Meister’s hedge fund Corvex Management has 2.5% stake in gene-sequencing machine makerActivist investor Keith Meister will join the board of directors of troubled gene-sequencing maker Illumina, and current board member Scott Gottlieb will become chairman.The detailsThe moves, which the company announced Tuesday after The Wall Street Journal reported they were coming, will take effect Friday.Copyright ©2025 Dow Jones & Company, Inc. html:
1. Business

Keith Meister’s hedge fund Corvex Management has 2.5% stake in gene-sequencing machine maker

Activist investor Keith Meister will join the board of directors of troubled gene-sequencing maker Illumina, and current board member Scott Gottlieb will become chairman.

The details

The moves, which the company announced Tuesday after The Wall Street Journal reported they were coming, will take effect Friday.
